mapper.insert: insert into article(id, title, content, digest, wordNum) value(null, #{title}, #{content}, #{digest}, #{wordNum})
mapper.select: select a.id, a.title, a.digest, a.view_count, a.like_count, a.wordNum, a.create_time, a.update_time, a.cover_id, c2.name coverImg, c.id categoryId, c.name categoryName from article a left join article_category ac on ac.article_id = a.id left join category c on ac.category_id = c.id left join cover c2 on a.cover_id = c2.id where a.`is_delete` = 0 order by a.id desc
SELECT FROM WHERE `is_delete` = 0 ORDER BY `hot_rank` DESC

SELECT a.*, c.name categoryName, c.id categoryId, c2.id coverId, c2.name coverImg FROM article a left join article_category ac on ac.article_id = a.id left join category c on ac.category_id = c.id left join cover c2 on a.cover_id = c2.id WHERE a.`id` = #{id} AND a.`is_delete` = 0

select count(*) articleNum, sum(wordNum) wordsNum, (select count(distinct real_ip) as visitorsNum from site_history ) visitorsNum, (select count(real_ip) as visitNum from site_history) visitNum from article where is_delete != 1
mapper.update: update article set like_count = like_count + 1 where id = #{articleId} and is_delete != 1
